name: DOMESTIC
description: An aeroplane service to a domestic destination.

name: HELICOPTER
description: A helicopter service.

name: INTERNATIONAL
description: An aeroplane service to an international destination.

name: AIRPORT_LINK
description: A bus route specifically aimed at transporting passengers to and from airports. Usually with special board/alight-rules on the intermediary stops.

name: EXPRESS
description: A regional bus serving fewer stops than its regionalBus counterpart (express departure). Not to be confused with coach services.

name: LOCAL
description: Any short range bus routes, city buses, or open school lines which are not distinctly marked with the school bus mode.

name: NIGHT
description: A local bus operating exclusively and specifically at night (usually midnight-5:00).

name: RAIL_REPLACEMENT
description: A temporary bus service replacing a temporarily disabled rail line.

name: REGIONAL
description: Any medium range buses which are not localBus, express bus, airport link bus, or a coach.

name: SCHOOL
description: A local bus specifically transporting students from their homes to their schools, but which may be used by the general public.

name: SHUTTLE
description: A local bus which acts only as a feeder route to other transports. Usually connecting to coaches, trains or airports.

name: SIGHTSEEING
description: A bus focusing primarily on the experience (tourism) of the journey instead of efficiency and speed.

name: INTERNATIONAL
description: A long-distance coach service which crosses an international border.

name: NATIONAL
description: A long-distance coach service which does not cross an international border.

name: AIRPORT_LINK
description: Airport express trains.

name: INTERNATIONAL
description: Diesel-trains which are not local- or intercity trains.

name: INTERREGIONAL
description: Trains which cross an international border.

name: LOCAL
description: Local train services for commuters and suburban transport.

name: LONG_DISTANCE
description: Intercity trains.

name: NIGHT
description: Train services with a particular focus on overnight journeys with sleeping compartments.

name: REGIONAL
description: Electrical trains which are not local- or intercity trains.

name: TOURIST
description: A train focusing primarily on the experience (tourism) of the journey instead of efficiency and speed. Usually outdated train models, sometimes on different gauge rails.

name: HIGH_SPEED_PASSENGER_SERVICE
description: A high speed boat service which does not carry cars. The ship type is usually a catamaran.

name: HIGH_SPEED_VEHICLE_SERVICE
description: A high speed boat service with car carrying capacity. The ship type is usually a catamaran.

name: INTERNATIONAL_CAR_FERRY
description: Car-carrying cruise ships between countries.

name: INTERNATIONAL_PASSENGER_FERRY
description: Ships to international destinations which do not carry cars.

name: LOCAL_CAR_FERRY
description: Car-carrying ships between, or as part of road networks. Does not include high speed services.

name: LOCAL_PASSENGER_FERRY
description: Boat services which are not: international, car carrying, or high-speed services.

name: NATIONAL_CAR_FERRY
description: A long-distance car-carrying ship which does not cross and international border.

name: SIGHTSEEING_SERVICE
description: A boat service focusing primarily on the experience (tourism) of the journey instead of efficiency and speed. Usually older ships.
